metadata.title: CVE-2014-3251 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The MCollective aes_security plugin, as used in Puppet Enterprise before3.3.0 and Mcollective before 2.5.3, does not properly validate new servercertificates based on the CA certificate, which allows local users toestablish unauthorized Mcollective connections via unspecified vectorsrelated to a race condition.

criterions.comment: mcollective: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
